description: A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

extension.valueMarkdown: Types are for general categories of identifiers. See [the identifier registry](identifier-registry.html) for a list of common identifier systems

name: Identifier Type Codes

text.div:
Identifier Type Codes

A coded type for an identifier that can be used to determine which identifier to use for a specific purpose.

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203
    CodeDisplay
    DLDriver's license number
    PPNPassport number
    BRNBreed Registry Number
    MRMedical record number
    MCNMicrochip Number
    ENEmployer number
    TAXTax ID number
    NIIPNational Insurance Payor Identifier (Payor)
    PRNProvider number
    MDMedical License number
    DRDonor Registration Number
  • Include all codes defined in http://hl7.org/fhir/identifier-type
